name: Bloon Away
description:
CLICK THE SCREEN TO BEGIN PLAYING.

USING THE ARROW KEYS, MOVE THE BALLOON AROUND TO COLLECT AS MANY COINS AS YOU CAN.

GOLD COINS = 1 POINT

RAINBOW COINS = 10 POINTS

The very easy first level of a kids game I made as part of an assignment, Uploaded here so it could be marked.. but If you get a chance to play it.. don't be too blown away ;)
